Description: Anthropoid mummy-case; painted cartonnage; no text.
Curator's comments: Published: S. Walker and M. Bierbrier, Fayum. Misteriosi volti dall'Egitto, London 1997, p. 58 [29]. Mark Smith in Bierbrier (ed.) Portraits and Masks (1997) p.66 [pl.7.2]. Riggs, Beautiful Burial in Roman Egypt (2005): 62, 66, 67, 83 , 83 Fig. 31, 85, 87, 88, 91, 265; n.6
Bibliographic references: Riggs 2005 / Beautiful burial in Roman Egypt (no.25, fig.31)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 22 Oct-1998 30 Apr, Italy, Rome, Fondaione Memmo, Ancient Faces
